name: socketio_chat_app
description: A production-grade real-time one-to-one messaging application built with a modern full-stack architecture, featuring secure authentication, optimistic UI rendering, online presence indicators, and scalable backend design. This project demonstrates how a professional chat platform is built using best practices across both frontend and backend.

scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix backend run build
